site_name: Land at Marshgate Lane, Pudding Mill, Stratford
description: Application under s73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended) for the variation of Condition 2 (approved drawings) of planning permission ref. 14/00422/FUL dated 5 May 2017 (comprehensive mixed use redevelopment comprising: demolition of existing buildings, and the erection of 8 buildings ranging from 3 to 12-storeys in height, comprising a total of 254 residential dwellings including affordable housing, and 4,257m Gross Internal Area (GIA) of B1 (business) floorspace, together with basement, access, servicing, car parking, cycle parking, cycle storage, plant, open space and landscaping).  The variation to Condition 2 (approved drawings) seeks to make changes to the approved scheme to include: (1) increase of employment use from 4,257m to 5,472m (additional 1,175m (GIA) floorspace); (2) decrease of residential floorspace from 28,003m to 27,514m (decrease of 489m (GIA) floorspace); (3) optimisation of residential floorspace, increasing the number of residential units from 254 to 260; and (4) alterations to faades and associated minor internal amendments to facilitate the proposed changes.
